downloadDescription: Template file to use as a guide for Viva Glint User Role creation.
detailsSection: Template file to use as a guide for Viva Glint User Role creation.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems

Android, iOS, Windows 10

All systems apply
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
    3. Additional Resources: These files are referenced in Set up Viva Glint User Roles (https://learn.microsoft.com/viva/glint/setup/set-up-user-roles).
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
